#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
int main()
{
    ll t,n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        if(n<20)
        {
            if(n<6 || n==10 || n&1)
                cout<<"RIDICULOUS"<<endl;
            else if(!(n%6))
                cout<<"NO"<<endl;
            else cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        }
        else
        {
            if(n&1)
                cout<<"RIDICULOUS"<<endl;
            else cout<<"YES"<<endl;
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
